LanguageData.CaravansRestBeforeArrival_DoNotEnterIf: Caravans do not enter a map until all members' needs reach at least:
LanguageData.CaravansRestBeforeArrival_NoFoodAction: If food needs are not met but the caravan is out of food:
LanguageData.CaravansRestBeforeArrival_NoFoodLetterTe: {0} has reached its destination and is resting because someone's food need is below {1}, but the caravan has no food and will continue to rest until it receives or gathers enough food.\n\nYou can toggle off the caravan's rest switch to proceed immediately.
